Class GrainBoundaryConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.config.GrainBoundaryConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class GrainBoundaryConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements Configuration, java.io.Serializable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GrainBoundaryConfiguration​(BravaisLatticeCrystal latticeA, BravaisLatticeCrystal latticeB, Space space)
      Construct class that will place atoms on sites of the given lattices, proceeding in the order resulting from iteration through the given index iterator.

        public void initializeCoordinates​(Box box)

      • getLatticeAMemento

        public SpaceLattice getLatticeAMemento​()
        Returns a lattice with positions the same as those used in the most recent use of initializeCoordinates. Includes any scaling or translation applied to fill the space, and thus will not necessarily be the same positions as specified by the lattice given at construction.

        public SpaceLattice getLatticeBMemento​()
